official-title.#text: To repeal sections 1341 and 1342 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

short-title.#text: No Bailouts for Insurance Industry Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Repeal of sections 1341 and 1342 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
